The price could have been set down a little bit, but not to much.
80% of the time i am survivor and 20% i am the killer.

None of my friends have this game so i am playing alone but it is still fantastic, when you play alone it gets even more scarier and thats what i like.

So i really recommend this game on the highest, its a must buy!

After playing for about 10 hours I can say that this game is pretty good......I only play as a survivor, because it is much more challenging and you are constantly on the edge. I read that many people dont like it because it is very hard for the survivors, but in my opinion it should be like that...in every horror movie most of the people are dead at the end, but some of them escape...its the same in this game. Many games have used this concept of horror hide n seek but, Dead by Daylight plays it so well that its enjoyable even if you have played the same map for the 100th time you don't know if you will escape from the cold blooded hands of the killer since every killer is different, and different players for the next time you play.

But what i would really want to see how could you play as the killer and have a friend or friends in there but also unknown players in the one session/lobby.

If you get what i mean.

Altough I don't have much hours in the game yet, I enjoy playing it. I recommend it, but first consider the following things:
1. It is really not beginner friendly because the rank reset causes high-level players to play against noob killers (like me).
2. You have to avoid being a killer for the same reason mentioned above and because the 95% of high-level players are toxic as hell. (Not only they abuse you as a killer, but they write "unsportsmanlike" things to you in the chat.)
3. The game is really unbalanced at the moment in the survivors favor.
